name: top_paid_ipad_apps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool app_store.
Tool description: Unofficial Apple App Store Api
API description: Gets a list of the top paid iPad apps from the specified category and country.

category.description: The App Store category for which to fetch the top paid iPad apps. Defaults to '6016'.

country.description: The country code for which to fetch the top paid iPad apps. Defaults to 'us'.

lang.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en'.

num.description:
Number of results to return. 
Default: 50
Max: 200
